attempts.raw_output:
The investigation reveals a **critical data loss vulnerability** in the SQL save path. Here's the triage:

```json
{"decision":"implement","reason":"SQL save uses DELETE-before-INSERT pattern via DataAdapter.Update() â€” if INSERT fails (BCP column error), DELETEs already executed cause total data loss; multiple users confirm random database truncation","priority":"P2-bug","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/Config/DataProviders/SqlDataProvider.cs","mRemoteNG/Config/Serializers/ConnectionSerializers/Sql/DataTableSerializer.cs","mRemoteNG/Config/Serializers/ConnectionSerializers/Sql/SqlConnectionsSaver.cs"],"approach":"Add pre-save validation to abort if connection tree is empty; restructure SqlDataProvider.Save() to ensure DELETE+INSERT are truly atomic within the transaction (reorder DataAdapter operations so INSERTs succeed before DELETEs execute); fix ParentID empty string vs '0' mismatch in DataTableSerializer"}
```
